title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is experiencing excessive flashing.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically only, it is observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The Control Example should not exhibit excessive flashing when resizing the window vertically.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically only.
3. Observe the flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
